content: Hi, my company would probably be willing to sponsor (and organize) security audits of a few crypto crates from the RustCrypto and dalek-cryptography projects. How should we proceed?

Main candidates would be the yet-unreviewed building blocks of the crypto_box / crypto_secretbox ecosystem: salsa20, curve25519-dalek, x25519-dalek, xsalsa20poly1305, crypto_box. Maybe also helper crates like zeroize and/or subtle.
